pullRequest.title: Implemented getHeight and setHeight on AbstractButtonWidget
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implemented https://github.com/PatchworkMC/YarnForge/blob/1.14.x/patches/minecraft/net/minecraft/client/gui/widget/AbstractButtonWidget.java.patch#L21
found on issue #125.
Change is very trivial and doesn't need testing.

commit.message: Implement getHeight and setHeight on AbstractButtonWidget

+package net.patchworkmc.mixin.gui;
+
+import org.spongepowered.asm.mixin.Mixin;
+import org.spongepowered.asm.mixin.Shadow;
+
+import net.minecraft.client.gui.DrawableHelper;
+import net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.AbstractButtonWidget;
+
+@Mixin(AbstractButtonWidget.class)
+public abstract class MixinAbstractButtonWidget extends DrawableHelper {
+	@Shadow
+	protected int height;
+
+	public int getHeight() {
+		return this.height;
